QuestData.Title: Speech Writing for Dummies
QuestData.Description: Listen, $n. I found out what they're doing with Jarod Shadowsong. He's scheduled to be sacrificed by the ogres of the Twilight's Hammer as part of this year's initiation.$B$BI heard that the initiate charged with delivering the speech ahead of the sacrifice is an ogre named Okrog, but get this: you were a close second.$B$BWe need you to deliver that speech if we're to free Jarod. Don't worry -- I'll write you some cue cards -- just make sure Okrog has an "accident" as he leaves the Seat of the Chosen.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: ...and by "accident", I mean I want you to kill him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Okrog outside the Seat of the Chosen in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n. Our plan's almost come together.
